description: Incremental tweak from iter_7 aimed at lowering overdraft cost while preserving 100% settlement. Slightly tightens liquidity_buffer and modestly reduces initial collateral to rely a bit more on intraday funding without adding delay.

on_true.description: Release when we have enough effective liquidity.

on_false.description: Hold when liquidity is insufficient for non-urgent payments.
For non-urgent payments, require effective_liquidity to cover amount times liquidity_buffer.

payment_tree.description: Release if payment is urgent (near its deadline) or we are in end-of-day rush; otherwise use liquidity-based rule.

bank_tree.description: No additional bank-level state or release budget logic in this simple policy.

on_true.description: Post a fraction of maximum collateral at day start to support early payments.

on_false.description: Do not adjust collateral intraday in this simple version.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: Post a modest amount of collateral at start of day, otherwise hold collateral decisions intraday.

end_of_tick_collateral_tree.description: Do not change collateral at end of tick; rely on strategic tree only.
